reviewText: Definitely the Fan Favorites!!  These are THE BEST episodes of Pink Panther.  If you enjoy the cartoon, this is the MUST HAVE collection. Classic in every sense of the word.
My 6 year old son and his 6 and 3 year old neighbours love our entire collection. I too still enjoy watching the Pink Panther.

This single DVD holds 24 Pink Panther shorts, as voted by fans, for his 50th anniversary in 2014! This'd be a good alternative to MGM and Kino Lorber's deluxe sets, if your kids don't like those sets' bonuses. Luckily for them, this disc has no bonuses at all! Strangely, the shorts ain't in chronological order, nor are they numbered from the fans' votes from 24 to 1! No matter what you decide on these Pink Panther DVD collections, you'll get a big kick out of any, or all, of them!
My favorite for many years. One of the best if not the best.
Good compilation of classic Pink Panther shorts
Brings back good memories.  I love pink panther!
Our family loves the Pink Panther.
